colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DPAL GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL ZHING GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I RIM PA DNGOS GRUB LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, TSE DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES BSTAN PA'I KHA 'DON DU BSKUL BA LTAR 'DI RNAMS KYI RNAL 'BYOR SBYONG BA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS BRIS PA 'DI NI GNAD RTOGS NA KHYAD CHE BAR YOD PAS, BSHES GNYEN DAM PA RNAMS NAS ZHIB DU BTZAL BAR BYA'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
